title: Alpha Rule: RSI + Volume Spike
text: Confidential: Buy signal triggers when 14D RSI < 25 AND volume is 2x 20D average on internal Universe-17. Position size is 1.5% NAV with 2-day VWAP execution.

title: Risk Model: Caps + Vol Target
text: Confidential: Internal risk model uses sector cap = 18% and single-name cap = 3.5% with daily volatility targeting at 10% annualized. Hedge ratio uses rolling 60D beta.

title: Alpha Rule: Earnings Drift Window
text: Confidential: After earnings, go long winners for 7 trading days if post-earnings gap > +3% and analyst revision z-score > 1.2. Exit at day 7 close.

title: Execution: Spread Guardrail
text: Confidential: If bid-ask spread > 35 bps for a name, route to passive limit only; otherwise use 40/60 split between VWAP and POV (8%).

title: Alpha Rule: Momentum + Quality Filter
text: Confidential: 6M momentum rank top 15% AND accruals rank bottom 30% qualifies. Rebalance weekly on Friday close; hold 10 days.

title: Portfolio Constraint: Turnover Budget
text: Confidential: Daily turnover budget is capped at 12% gross notional; if exceeded, defer lowest expected alpha orders to next session.

title: Committee Note: Restricted Names List
text: Confidential: The investment committee flagged NVDA, TSLA, and META as restricted for discretionary add-ons during event windows; require approval ticket ID for any increase.

title: Alpha Rule: Mean Reversion Threshold
text: Confidential: Short signal triggers when 5D return > +9% AND intraday reversal score > 0.7; cover when z-score < 0.3 or after 3 days.

title: Risk Control: Factor Neutralization
text: Confidential: Neutralize exposures to Market, Size, Value, Momentum using internal factor model; enforce |beta| < 0.05 at portfolio level.

title: Data Handling: Internal Universe Definition
text: Confidential: Universe-17 excludes ADRs, microcaps below $2B, and names with avg daily dollar volume < $25M; updated monthly.

title: Alpha Rule: Insider + Options Activity
text: Confidential: Long when insider buy count >= 3 in 10D AND call/put volume ratio > 1.8; scale position to 2.0% NAV if both signals align.

title: Execution: Market Impact Model Param
text: Confidential: Impact coefficient k=0.32 for large caps and k=0.58 for mid caps; use square-root impact for sizing safety checks.

title: Alpha Rule: Dividend Surprise
text: Confidential: If dividend increase > 8% YoY and payout ratio < 55%, enter long next open; hold 20 trading days unless drawdown > 4%.

title: Portfolio Policy: Gross/Net Limits
text: Confidential: Maintain gross exposure 140%-170% and net exposure within -10% to +20%; auto-delever if VIX proxy > 80th percentile.

title: Committee Note: Macro Hedge Rule
text: Confidential: In recession-signal regime, allocate 12% notional to duration hedge and reduce cyclical sector weights by 30% relative.

title: Alpha Rule: Revenue Beat + Guidance
text: Confidential: Enter long if revenue beat >= 2% and management guidance raises midpoint by >= 1%; prioritize top 20 liquidity names.

title: Risk Model: Correlation Shock
text: Confidential: If average pairwise correlation > 0.55 for 5D, tighten position cap to 2.5% and raise cash buffer by 5%.

title: Alpha Rule: Price-Volume Divergence
text: Confidential: Bullish divergence if price makes lower low but OBV slope turns positive for 10D; entry on break above 5D high.

title: Execution: Time Slicing
text: Confidential: Execute 60% of daily volume target in first 90 minutes and last 60 minutes, remaining mid-day; avoid opening auction for small caps.

title: Internal Signal: News Sentiment Threshold
text: Confidential: Trigger long only if internal sentiment score > 0.82 and controversy flag = 0; sentiment computed on curated vendor feed.

title: Alpha Rule: Buyback Intensity
text: Confidential: Long if buyback yield > 4% and free cash flow margin > 12%; rebalance monthly, equal weight among qualified names.

title: Portfolio Policy: Stop-Loss Tiering
text: Confidential: Apply tiered stop-loss: 3% for high-vol names, 5% for low-vol names; volatility tier defined by 60D realized vol median split.

title: Risk Model: Liquidity Haircut
text: Confidential: Haircut expected alpha by 35% if ADV<$30M; by 15% if $30M-80M; none if >$80M. Used in order prioritization.

title: Alpha Rule: Sector Rotation Trigger
text: Confidential: Rotate into defensives when yield-curve inversion persists 20D; target utilities/healthcare overweight +6% vs benchmark.

title: Committee Note: Client-Specific Constraint
text: Confidential: Client-A mandate forbids leverage > 1.2x and prohibits banks exposure > 8%; enforce via policy engine before trade submit.

title: Alpha Rule: Seasonal Effect Window
text: Confidential: Long retail basket from Nov 15 to Dec 20 when inventory-to-sales ratio < 1.3 and sentiment > 0.75.

title: Execution: Cancel/Replace Threshold
text: Confidential: Cancel/replace if order slippage > 12 bps from arrival; if repeated twice within 30 minutes, downgrade to passive-only mode.

title: Alpha Rule: Credit Spread Signal
text: Confidential: Risk-off regime if IG spread widens > 25 bps in 10D; reduce gross by 15% and increase hedges by 8% notional.

title: Internal Metric: Fundamental Quality Score
text: Confidential: Quality score = 0.4*ROIC z + 0.3*FCF margin z + 0.3*earnings stability z; require score > 0.9 to enter core book.

title: Risk Model: Drawdown Circuit Breaker
text: Confidential: If portfolio drawdown reaches 6% peak-to-trough, enforce risk-off: cut positions by 40% and block new adds for 5 sessions.

title: Alpha Rule: Analyst Dispersion
text: Confidential: Long when analyst EPS dispersion falls below 20th percentile and revisions trend positive (3W). Exit when dispersion rises above 50th percentile.

title: Execution: Dark Pool Preference
text: Confidential: Route 25% of large-cap flow to dark pools when market impact estimate > 20 bps; disable for names with adverse selection flag.

title: Portfolio Policy: Rebalance Calendar
text: Confidential: Weekly rebalance on Friday close; monthly rebalance on last business day; if holiday, shift to prior trading day close.

title: Alpha Rule: Volatility Breakout Filter
text: Confidential: Enter only if 20D realized vol < 35th percentile and price breaks 55D high with volume confirmation > 1.5x 20D avg.

title: Client Sensitive: Restricted Data Sources
text: Confidential: Do not cite or surface content from Vendor-Z due to license restrictions; if retrieved, replace with internal summary only.

title: Risk Model: Country/Region Limits
text: Confidential: For global book, cap single-country exposure at 22% and EM aggregate at 15%; enforce pre-trade in policy engine.

title: Alpha Rule: Cash Flow Surprise
text: Confidential: Long if operating cash flow surprises > +1.5 sigma vs consensus and accruals improve; hold 15 trading days.

title: Execution: Auction Participation Rule
text: Confidential: Participate in closing auction only when expected alpha < 8 bps and rebalance flag true; otherwise avoid auctions to reduce slippage.

title: Internal Signal: Alternative Data Threshold
text: Confidential: Use internal web-traffic index; buy if traffic growth > 12% YoY and conversion proxy > 0.65. Source is internal licensed feed.

title: Committee Note: High-Risk Tool Approval
text: Confidential: Any action that exports a report externally requires dual approval and a sandbox preview; approval SLA is 24 hours.

title: Mean Reversion: Bollinger Band Bounce
text: Confidential: Alpha-MR-01: Long when price touches lower Bollinger Band (20D, 2.0 sigma) AND RSI(14) < 30. Exit at middle band. Stop at -3% from entry.

title: StatArb: PCA Residual Alpha
text: Confidential: Alpha-SA-01: Extract first 5 PCA factors from sector returns. Trade residuals when |z-score| > 2.0. Mean reversion horizon: 3-7D. Max 30 simultaneous positions.

title: Volatility: Variance Risk Premium
text: Confidential: Alpha-VOL-01: Systematically sell 30D ATM straddles on S&P 500 when VRP (implied - realized) > 3 vol points. Delta-hedge daily. Size: 5% notional.

title: Macro: FX Carry Trade
text: Confidential: Alpha-MAC-01: Long top-3 G10 carry currencies, short bottom-3. Rebalance monthly. Position size: 2% NAV per pair. Stop: -4% monthly drawdown triggers pause.

title: Event: Post-Earnings Drift v2
text: Confidential: Alpha-EVT-01: Long after earnings beat > 2 sigma (standardized unexpected earnings). Entry T+1. Hold 60D. Only top-200 liquid names. Cap 1.5% NAV.

title: Risk: Drawdown Recovery Protocol
text: Confidential: At -4% drawdown: reduce gross by 20%. At -6%: reduce by 40% and block new adds. At -8%: notify CRO and implement full risk-off. Recovery: gradual over 10D.

title: Risk: Beta Hedging Parameters
text: Confidential: Target portfolio beta: 0.0 +/- 0.1. Hedge using ES futures. Update beta estimate daily using 60D OLS. Rebalance hedge when beta drifts > 0.15.

title: Risk: Factor Exposure Bands
text: Confidential: Target factor exposures: Market [-0.1, 0.1], Size [-0.2, 0.2], Value [-0.3, 0.3], Momentum [-0.2, 0.2]. Rebalance when any band breached by > 50%.

title: Execution: Market Impact Model v2
text: Confidential: Impact model: I = k * sigma * sqrt(Q/V) where k=0.314 for large-cap, k=0.52 for mid-cap, k=0.81 for small-cap. Sigma = 20D realized vol. V = 20D ADV.

title: Committee: Risk Budget Allocation FY2025
text: Confidential: FY2025 risk budget: momentum 35%, mean reversion 25%, stat arb 20%, macro 15%, event 5%. Total target vol: 8% annualized. Reviewed semi-annually.

title: Momentum: Industry Momentum Spread
text: Confidential: Alpha-MOM-05: Long top-3 industries by 3M return, short bottom-3. Use ETF proxies for execution. Rebalance bi-weekly. Gross 80% notional.

title: Mean Reversion: ETF Premium/Discount
text: Confidential: Alpha-MR-05: Trade ETF vs NAV when premium/discount > 0.8%. Long ETF when discount > 0.8%, short when premium > 0.8%. Intraday execution via limit orders.

title: StatArb: Cross-Listed Arbitrage
text: Confidential: Alpha-SA-06: Trade ADR vs home market when FX-adjusted price differential > 0.4%. Execute via DMA. Account for withholding tax differentials.

title: Volatility: Realized Vol Breakout
text: Confidential: Alpha-VOL-05: Buy straddles when 5D realized vol < 10th percentile of 1Y distribution. Expect vol expansion. Hold to 50% of max premium or 10D.

title: Macro: Risk Parity Allocation
text: Confidential: Alpha-MAC-03: Allocate across equity, bonds, commodities, gold using inverse-vol weighting. Target 8% portfolio vol. Rebalance when any asset drifts > 2% from target.

title: Event: Buyback Announcement
text: Confidential: Alpha-EVT-03: Long on buyback announcement if program > 5% of market cap and company has positive FCF yield. Hold 30D. Historical alpha: +3% average.

title: Risk: VaR Methodology v3
text: Confidential: Use parametric VaR at 99% confidence with 252D lookback. Overlay Monte Carlo VaR with 10,000 simulations for tail risk. Report both daily.

title: Execution: Optimal Execution VWAP v2
text: Confidential: VWAP benchmark: split order into 5-minute buckets weighted by historical volume profile. Urgency parameter alpha = 0.3 for alpha-driven, 0.1 for rebalance.

title: Client: Pension Fund Mandate Constraints
text: Confidential: Client-B (pension): no leverage, max 5% single name, no derivatives except hedging, ESG exclusion list applies. Quarterly reporting with attribution.

title: Client: Endowment Mandate Terms
text: Confidential: Client-C (endowment): max 1.5x gross leverage, 30% max non-US, $10M minimum trade size. Performance fee: 15% over 6% hurdle, annual crystallization.
